Key Match Events: Afghanistan out of the T20 World Cup after going down by six wickets in Brisbane
Dhananjaya de Silva's stay in the middle ensured that there is no other end to this script
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Nabi, Afghanistan captain: 'We did not get any momentum. We have one more game and hopefully we do well.'
Dasun Shanaka, Sri Lanka captain: 'It was a good performance with bat and bowl. Special credit to Dhananjaya de Silva.'

Sifat Khawry : 'Afghanistan's last two matches where called off because of rain where they had chance to defeat Ireland and get use to the conditions against New Zealand and that would have help them a lot in today's game.. '
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Brisbane Cricket Ground, Woolloongabba, Brisbane
Others: Wanindu Hasaranga was named the Player of the Match
Dhananjaya de Silva was named CricInfo's MVP with 98.33 points
